entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 2.
